description: This file is a shell script that configures wireless interfaces, hostapd services, DHCP settings, and network bridge setup for a router device. It includes functions to restart services and scripts to modify configuration files, manage network interfaces, and start network services.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service and related network interfaces for 2G.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd_5G
methods.description: Reloads kernel modules rtl8812au and 88x2bu, then restarts hostapd for the 5G interface.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Kills existing hostapd processes and restarts the hostapd service.
